Nightshift knew he would get in trouble by Rodimus but, he also knew Master=
 Yokitron's views and what he might have thought about taking a young Warri=
or into their first confrontation with the enemy.  " Youth is the time for =
learning, and there is nothing greater than a young mind that is eager to o=
btain the knowledge that will layer serve a greater purpose."

" I know he'=
ll be sore at me for this but, all great warriors gotta start somewhere and=
 be given the chance ta grow into their own state of being.  My Sensai woul=
d've agreed with what we're doing, and what was good enough for him is good=
 enough for me.  So let's go kick some Con's cans and show them what we're =
made of."

As Straight Shot rides with Talon, she picks up on Tucson's loca=
tion and from a far, realizes what is now transpiring between him and Hydra=
s!  Still in cross bow mode, she calibrates her systems and weight distribu=
tion to fit Talon's configurations, for optimal results.

" Hydras!  Ohhh I=
 can't believe he's gonna face off with him again!  He doesn't realize that=
 he needs help!  Wait, Ohh good, he's not alone, Rodimus is with him.  But =
still, it doesn't hurt ta lend him a hand.  I better let Leo Prime in on th=
is, he's probably wondering why Tucson isn't contacting him, which is somet=
hing he's notorious for doing. "

She opens her link to Leo Prime.

" Leo P=
rime, it's me, Straight Shot.  Talon and I are reaching Tucson's location s=
hortly and I'm sure he hasn't contacted you yet.  He's with Rodimus and now=
 he's facing off with Hydras.  A lotta fire just got deployed and I'm defin=
itely sure it wasn't from Hydras.  Tucson's in a really bad mood, and I thi=
nk it's about ta get worse."

Much to Straight Shot's suspicion, Tucson doe=
s indeed have the look of an enraged predator on his draconic face.  What h=
e wouldn't do to be able to sink his sharp claws into Hydras, tearing at hi=
s armor until there was nothing left.  Yet he holds enough restraint to hol=
d back from doing so, for the time being.  

" Many innocent creatures who =
were native to this planet have lost their lives needlessly, no thanks to y=
ou and your reign of greed and destruction.  This is NOT our planet and we =
have NO right taking away what belongs here!  That is what brings me here, =
Hydras!  This planet deserves freedom and I am here to make sure it gets it=
!"

He exclaims with a loud draconic roar, as smoke seeps out of his flarin=
g nostrils as do a couple of white hot flames.

With Rodimus still on his b=
ack, Tucson circles Hydras as the never ending coils of his long tail creat=
es a ring around the enemy.

"Rodimus, this is also your chance to take bac=
k something that was taken from you.  No holds barred, do what you feel is =
the right thing, and what you feel in your spark is rightful to your cause.=
  I will follow suit.  We will fight as one, and as one we will serve judge=
ment to those who deserve it. "

He remains in his circling pattern, waitin=
g for Rodimus to direct him, in hopes to help build his confidence as an Au=
tobot Commander.  At the same time, Tucson had to learn to control his grea=
test weakness, his uncontrollable temper which left unchecked, had the pote=
ntial to turn him into an extremely dangerous individual.  Now that he take=
s on the role of a powerful creature, it would prove hard to quell the fire=
 that burns deep within his spark.  He hoped that this partnership would he=
lp keep the balance between the both of them.  They would need that more th=
an ever if they have hopes of stopping Hydras for good.



Perpetually on t=
he move and constantly busy.

ergy signatures, their dark forms darting over the fire looking

ike moths over a bright flame. However these moths are firing

energy at the fire keeping it bright and hot.
>>

king up the Predacons, they seemed to be

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Nightshift knew he would get in troubl=
e by Rodimus but, he also knew Master Yokitron's views and what he might ha=
ve thought about taking a young Warrior into their first confrontation with=
 the enemy.  " Youth is the time for learning, and there is nothing gr=
eater than a young mind that is eager to obtain the knowledge that will lay=
er serve a greater purpose."</div><div><br></div><div>" I know he'll be sor=
e at me for this but, all great warriors gotta start somewhere and be given=
 the chance ta grow into their own state of being.  My Sensai would've=

ugh for me.  So let's go kick some Con's cans and show them what we're=

ing between him and Hydras!  Still in cross bow mode, she calibrates h=
er systems and weight distribution to fit Talon's configurations, for optim=
al results.</div><div><br></div><div>" Hydras!  Ohhh I can't believe h=
e's gonna face off with him again!  He doesn't realize that he needs h=
elp!  Wait, Ohh good, he's not alone, Rodimus is with him.  But s=
till, it doesn't hurt ta lend him a hand.  I better let Leo Prime in o=
n this, he's probably wondering why Tucson isn't contacting him, which is s=
omething he's notorious for doing. "</div><div><br></div><div>She opens her=
 link to Leo Prime.</div><div><br></div><div>" Leo Prime, it's me, Straight=
 Shot.  Talon and I are reaching Tucson's location shortly and I'm sur=
e he hasn't contacted you yet.  He's with Rodimus and now he's facing =
off with Hydras.  A lotta fire just got deployed and I'm definitely su=
re it wasn't from Hydras.  Tucson's in a really bad mood, and I think =
it's about ta get worse."</div><div><br></div><div>Much to Straight Shot's =
suspicion, Tucson does indeed have the look of an enraged predator on his d=
raconic face.  What he wouldn't do to be able to sink his sharp claws =
into Hydras, tearing at his armor until there was nothing left.  Yet h=
e holds enough restraint to hold back from doing so, for the time being. &n=
bsp;</div><div><br></div><div>" Many innocent creatures who were native to =
this planet have lost their lives needlessly, no thanks to you and your rei=
gn of greed and destruction.  This is NOT our planet and we have NO ri=
ght taking away what belongs here!  That is what brings me here, Hydra=
s!  This planet deserves freedom and I am here to make sure it gets it=
!"</div><div><br></div><div>He exclaims with a loud draconic roar, as smoke=
 seeps out of his flaring nostrils as do a couple of white hot flames.</div=
><div><br></div><div>With Rodimus still on his back, Tucson circles Hydras =
as the never ending coils of his long tail creates a ring around the enemy.=
</div><div><br></div><div>"Rodimus, this is also your chance to take back s=
omething that was taken from you.  No holds barred, do what you feel i=
s the right thing, and what you feel in your spark is rightful to your caus=
e.  I will follow suit.  We will fight as one, and as one we will=
 serve judgement to those who deserve it. "</div><div><br></div><div>He rem=
ains in his circling pattern, waiting for Rodimus to direct him, in hopes t=
o help build his confidence as an Autobot Commander.  At the same time=
, Tucson had to learn to control his greatest weakness, his uncontrollable =
temper which left unchecked, had the potential to turn him into an extremel=
y dangerous individual.  Now that he takes on the role of a powerful c=
reature, it would prove hard to quell the fire that burns deep within his s=
park.  He hoped that this partnership would help keep the balance betw=
een the both of them.  They would need that more than ever if they hav=
e hopes of stopping Hydras for good.</div><div><br></div><div><br><br>Perpe=
